      • getDfuProxy

        public static boolean getDfuProxy(android.content.Context context,
                                  RealsilDfuCallback listener)
        Get the DFU proxy object.

        Clients must implement RealsilDfuCallback to get notified of the connection status and to get the proxy object.

        参数:
        context - Context of the application
        listener - The service Listener for connection callbacks.
        返回:
        true on success, false on error

      • start

        public boolean start(java.lang.String addr,
                     java.lang.String path)
        start OTA upgrade process, This method is ASYNCHRONOUS, it return true means start OTA upgrade process, stop with the callbackRealsilDfuCallback. if return false means something error, please check the arguments and the bluetooth state.
        参数:
        addr - the device address which want to start OTA Upgrade
        path - the image file path
        返回:
        true/false result of start, the

      • setSecretKey

        public boolean setSecretKey(byte[] key)
        Sets AES secret key, this key's length must be 32
        参数:
        key - secret key
        返回:
        true/false result of set key

        返回:

        返回:

      • setSpeedControl

        public boolean setSpeedControl(boolean en,
                               int speed)
        Set the current OTA image send speed, this only need use for Android4.4, for deal with the internal BUG. The total speed should set though the current environment, if only have one connection(OTA), we may can set 5000(5KB/s), if with a A2DP link, the speed suggest set with 1000(1KB/s). the normal speed is 3KB/s.

        If work in silent mode, please set a min value, such as 100(100B/s) to make sure OTA process didn't affect the normal traffic.

        参数:
        en - enable or disable speed control
        speed - set the total speed
        返回:
        true/false true means set mode success

      • setNeedWaitUserCheckFlag

        public boolean setNeedWaitUserCheckFlag(boolean en)
        Set need wait user check flag, in silent mode, we will download image silent, but in the last, when we do all the thing, we should wait user check to active the image.

        Other work mode normally didn't use this.

        参数:
        en - enable or disable user check
        返回:
        true/false true means set mode success

      • activeImage

        public boolean activeImage(boolean en)
        When set the need wait user check flag, should call this method to active the image in the last of OTA process.

        Other work mode normally didn't use this.

        参数:
        en - enable or disable user check
        返回:
        true/false true means set mode success
